meanings.sent1: The landscape showed signs of postglacial changes.
meanings.sent2: The scientists studied the postglacial environment.
meanings.sent3: The postglacial weather made the animals shed their winter coats early.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a postglacial breeze.
meanings.sent5: The postglacial transformation was like a rebirth for the region.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period after the last glacial period.
meanings.sent1: The postglacial era brought new life to the barren lands.
meanings.sent2: Many species evolved during the postglacial period.
meanings.sent3: The postglacial celebration marked the end of the harsh winter.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were as innovative as postglacial adaptations.
meanings.sent5: The postglacial dawn painted the sky in vibrant colors.
